name: Erica (itch)
description:
A man that feels like his life has no meaning takes to his past time to try and re-vitalize not only himself, but something he thinks will help mankind. Quitting his job and gathering the necessary equipment and resources, George Litner sets out to create the uncreated. His state-of-the-art creation is one of a kind and it's primary function? Only time will tell.

A fully voiced and narrated game created in roughly two weeks for the Senscape Game Jam.

This is our first game using UE4.

Current bugs:

Removing parts that start on the robot, aren't replaceable.  Do not remove these or it breaks the game. Parts are arms and head. Everything else should be added to the character.
